pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data to accompany Applied Linear Regression 4th edition // This package is a companion to the textbook S. Weisberg (2014), "Applied Linear Regression," 4th edition, Wiley. It includes all the data sets discussed in the book and one function to access the textbook's website. This package depends on the car package. Many data files in this package are included in the alr3 package as well, so only one of them should be loaded.
